author: 0xevan
content:
<@808969530608451584> hey I am trying to use your repository here

https://github.com/ethpandaops/goomy-blob/tree/master

author: 0xevan
content:
but having problems. It keeps trying to fund child wallets...this command here
```./blob-spammer normal --privkey private_key --rpchost https://ethereum-rpc.publicnode.com --throughput 3 --max-pending 3 --max-wallets 0```

has this output:
```WARN[0000] client check completed (1 good clients, 0 bad clients) 
INFO[0001] initialized root wallet (addr: 0xc6D66bfca39d5f8f8afb765CD9e099623727f105 balance: 0 ETH, nonce: 0) 
INFO[0001] funding child wallets... (0/30)              
WARN[0011] could not send funding tx: insufficient funds for gas * price + value ```

author: 0xevan
content: I dont want any child wallets - I just want the private key wallet to send blobs in a continuous manner to holesky

author: ryanleeschneider
content: FWIW I tried figuring out a way to skip the child wallets last week but couldn't find one.  If you don't need the full goomy logic you could just use `cast send --blob` in a loop.

author: 0xevan
content: I ended up finding this which was helpful. Minimal modifications to send a blob programmatically - https://github.com/colinlyguo/EIP-4844-dev-usage/blob/main/blob-send-transaction-Go-SDK/main.go
